20110125181731.000|20110125181733.000|TR0|VELSHI: The housing bust was a disaster on 
20110125181733.000|20110125181736.000|TR0|many levels. It started this recession 
20110125181736.000|20110125181738.000|TR0|that we went through. But it did have a 
20110125181738.000|20110125181740.000|TR0|plus side -- more affordable homes. Home 
20110125181740.000|20110125181743.000|TR0|prices dropped so severely in many markets 
20110125181743.000|20110125181745.000|TR0|that it completely changed the equation of 
20110125181745.000|20110125181747.000|TR0|whether or not to rent or buy in many 
20110125181747.000|20110125181750.000|TR0|cities. And that's according to a report 
20110125181750.000|20110125181752.000|TR0|by the real estate website Trulia, 
20110125181752.000|20110125181754.000|TR0|although this data is something we sort of 
20110125181754.000|20110125181756.000|TR0|have been talking about for some years. 
20110125181756.000|20110125181759.000|TR0|Trulia did the math and it assigned a 
20110125181759.000|20110125181801.000|TR0|numerical value to various U.S. cities.
20110125181801.000|20110125181803.000|TR0|
20110125181803.000|20110125181806.000|TR0|A low, single-digit number makes the city 
20110125181806.000|20110125181808.000|TR0|a buy. Meaning it makes more sense to buy 
20110125181808.000|20110125181810.000|TR0|than to rent. While a higher double-digit 
20110125181810.000|20110125181813.000|TR0|number makes it a rent city. Of the 50 
20110125181813.000|20110125181815.000|TR0|major cities covered in the report, 36 
20110125181815.000|20110125181817.000|TR0|were better to buy in, 10 made more sense 
20110125181817.000|20110125181820.000|TR0|to rent in. Here's a look at six of the 
20110125181820.000|20110125181822.000|TR0|top cities to buy in. The six top cities

20110125181824.000|20110125181827.000|TR0|Arlington, Texas, Phoenix, Mesa, Arizona,

20110125184033.000|20110125184035.000|TR0|
20110125184035.000|20110125184038.000|TR0|BEN WEDEMAN, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Well, 
20110125184038.000|20110125184040.000|TR0|certainly, you know, Egypt is the biggest 
20110125184040.000|20110125184042.000|TR0|and most populous Arab country.  And when 
20110125184042.000|20110125184045.000|TR0|its people start to demonstrate in the 
20110125184045.000|20110125184047.000|TR0|numbers we saw today, which I have to tell 
20110125184047.000|20110125184049.000|TR0|you, I have never seen, it's really going 
20110125184049.000|20110125184052.000|TR0|to shake the foundations, not just of this 
20110125184052.000|20110125184054.000|TR0|government which has been in power now 
20110125184054.000|20110125184056.000|TR0|since 1981, but across the region.
